H0.text: What is the common name for the fruit of the blackthorn. Damson

H1.text: What is the common name for the fruit of the blackthorn. Bullace

H2.text: What is the common name for the fruit of the blackthorn. Wild Plum

H3.text: What is the common name for the fruit of the blackthorn. Sloe

A4.text: The fruit, called a 'sloe', is a drupe 10â€“12 millimetres in diameter, black with a purple-blue waxy bloom, ripening in autumn.
